title: ATLAS - VERIFICATION OF PRENOTATIONS EXISTENCE AND DELETE IF ANY
time_sequence: GR - ATLAS PHASE 6.3 - PROCESSING AFTER STAR 2

task_list.instruction_title:
Verification of the existence of prenotations and deletion if necessary (query and Macros are in folder PRENOTATIONS)

==> Si des operations de transferts ont été validées, les preno ne sont pas supprimées par les EOD* (jobs P_PRENO non montés au plan)

select tdc.nbr_co_0635, tdc.code_dept_letter_0635,substr(to_char(tdc.nbr_tnfr_order_0635),length(to_char(tdc.nbr_tnfr_order_0635)) - 5,6), tdc.code_dr_cr_0635
     , tn.nbr_tnfr_order_0633, tn.code_stat_tnfr_0633, tn.date_time_crea_rec_0633
 from nhdbo.t_tnfr tn 
 inner join nhdbo.t_tnfr_dc tdc
   on tn.nbr_co_0633 = tdc.nbr_co_0633_0635
  and tn.code_dept_letter_0633 = tdc.code_dept_letter_0633_0635
  and tn.nbr_tnfr_order_0633 = tdc.nbr_tnfr_order_0633_0635
  
where tn.code_stat_tnfr_0633 not in (111)
  and tn.code_type_tnfr_0633 = 0
  and tdc.code_type_acct_0635 <> 'G'
  and to_char(tn.date_time_crea_rec_0633,'YYYYMMDD') =  to_char(sysdate,'YYYYMMDD')
order by tn.nbr_co_0633, tn.code_dept_letter_0633, tn.nbr_tnfr_order_0633
;
